name: Croissant
description: Delicious, flaky pastry that originated in France. It is typically made from a dough composed of flour, water, yeast, sugar, salt, and butter.

name: Cinnamon Bun
description: It typically consists of a rolled dough that is filled with a mixture of butter, sugar, and cinnamon.

name: Doughnuts
description: They are typically round or ring-shaped pastries made from a sweet, enriched dough that is fried until golden brown.

name: Brownies
description: Brownies are made using ingredients such as flour, sugar, eggs, butter or oil, and cocoa powder or melted chocolate.

name: Cookies
description: A cookie is a type of baked or baked dessert. It usually contains flour, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil or butter.

name: Tarts
description: Tart is a baked food consisting of a filling on an open pastry base.

name: WHITE BREAD
description: The bran and germ are the nutrient-rich parts of the wheat grain that contain fiber, vitamins, and minerals.

name: FARMING BREAD
description: Farming bread is a staple in many diets around the world and is commonly used for sandwiches.

name: LOAF BREAD
description: It has a milder flavor and a softer, lighter texture compared to whole wheat bread.

name: SOURDOUGH
description: Sourdough is a type of bread that is made using a natural fermentation process. It is characterized by its distinct tangy flavor.

name: WHOLE-GRAIN BREAD
description: Whole-grain bread is a type of bread made from flour that includes the entire grain kernel, including the bran, germ, and endosperm.

name: OLIVE BREAD
description: Olive bread is a type of bread that is flavored with olives.
